conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a drama movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: What a great mood you're in! If you're looking for a classic drama that's sure to sweep you away, I highly recommend "Gone with the Wind". Scarlett O'Hara and Rhett Butler's tumultuous relationship is iconic for a reason - it's a masterclass in dramatic storytelling. With Vivien Leigh and Clark Gable at the helm, this 1936 epic is not to be missed!

conversation.speaker: USER

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I think I've got just the movie for you! "The Departed" is a gripping drama that explores the cat-and-mouse game between an undercover cop and a mole in the police force. With an all-star cast including Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, and Jack Nicholson, this film is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit more introspective, "Unbreakable" might be the way to go. This thought-provoking film delves into themes of identity and self-discovery as its protagonist learns to cope with his newfound abilities. With Bruce Willis and Samuel L. Jackson leading the cast, this movie is sure to resonate with anyone who's ever stopped to think about their place in the world.
